Double.Name: LoadCurve
Double.Label: Load Curve
Double.BriefDescription: Used with the RNG k-e turbulence model (epsbc::sideset [loadCurveId])

Double.Name: Scale
Double.Label: Scale
Double.BriefDescription: Used with the RNG k-e turbulence model (epsbc::sideset [amplitude])

Double.Name: LoadCurve
Double.Label: Load Curve
Double.BriefDescription: Used with the RNG k-e turbulence model (turbnubc::sideset [loadCurveId])

Double.Name: Scale
Double.Label: Scale
Double.BriefDescription: Used with the RNG k-e turbulence model (turbnubc::sideset [amplitude])

Int.Name: ExecutionControl
Int.Label: Execution Control Frequency Checking
Int.BriefDescription: Frequency of checking execution control file (exe_control)

Double.Name: tke
Double.Label: Initial turbulent kinetic energy
Double.BriefDescription: Turbulent kinetic energy for k-e and k-w models (initial::tke)

Double.Name: itdr
Double.Label: Initial turbulent dissipation rate
Double.BriefDescription: Initial turbulent dissipation rate for k-e models (initial::eps)

Double.Name: idts
Double.Label: Inverse dissipation time scale
Double.BriefDescription: Initial turbulent dissipation time scale for k-w models (initial::omega)

Double.Name: tv
Double.Label: Turbulent viscosity
Double.BriefDescription: Turbulent viscosity for Spalart-Allmaras and DES models (initial::turbnu)

Void.Name: rigid
Void.Label: Rigid body specification
Void.BriefDescription: Rigid body material specification for native conjugate heat transfer (material::rigid)

Int.Name: frequency
Int.Label: Frequency
Int.BriefDescription: Output dump file frequency. 0 implies do not output. (dump)

Int.Name: frequency
Int.Label: Frequency
Int.BriefDescription: Output plot file frequency. 0 implies do not output. (plti)

Int.Name: minmaxfrequency
Int.Label: Interval to report min/max velocity values

Int.Name: tifrequency
Int.Label: Time history write frequency
Int.BriefDescription: Interval to write time-history data to the time-history files (thti)

String.Name: PrintLevel
String.Label: ASCII Print Level
String.BriefDescription: Controls the amount of data written to the ASCII (human-readable) output file (prtlevel)

Double.Name: Value
Double.Label: Load Curve
Double.DetailedDescription: Prescribe the hydrostatic pressure. This may be used in conjunction with prescribed pressure boundary conditions, or by itself. When used by itself, the hstat keyword plays two roles. It makes the pressure-Poisson equation non-singular and it permits the pressure for the system to be uniquely determined. When the hstat keyword is used with prescribed pressure boundary conditions, then it only specifies the unique hydrostatic pressure level for the system. In either case, the pressure time-history and field output is adjusted to reflect the specified hydrostatic pressure level.

Int.Name: itchk
Int.Label: Convergence criteria checking frequency
Int.BriefDescription: The number of iterations to take before checking convergence criteria (momentumsolver::itchk)

Void.Name: diagnostics
Void.Label: Diagnostics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the diagnostic information from the solver (momentumsolver::diagnostics)

Void.Name: convergence
Void.Label: Convergence metrics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the convergence metrics or the solver (momentumsolver::convergence)

Int.Name: agg_num_levels
Int.Label: Number of Levels of Aggressive Coarsening

Int.Name: agg_num_paths
Int.Label: Number of Paths of Aggressive Coarsening

Value.Enum: classical Ruge-Steuben on each processor, no boundary treatment
classical Ruge-Steuben on each processor, followed by a third pass
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Forward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Backward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Forward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Backward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Forward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Backward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Forward Solve
Hybrid Gauss-Seidel or SOR, Backward Solve

Double.Name: max_rowsum
Double.Label: Parameter to Modify the Definition of Strength for Diagonally Dominant Portions of the Matrix

Int.Name: itmax
Int.Label: Maximum number of iterations
Int.BriefDescription: The maximum number of iterations. In the case of AMG, this is the maximum number of V or W cycles (ppesolver::itmax).

Int.Name: itchk
Int.Label: Convergence criteria checking frequency
Int.BriefDescription: The number of iterations to take before checking convergence criteria (ppesolver::itchk).

Void.Name: diagnostics
Void.Label: Diagnostics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the diagnostic information from the linear solver (ppesolver::diagnostics)

Void.Name: convergence
Void.Label: Convergence metrics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the convergence metrics or the linear solver (ppesolver::convergence)

Int.Name: nsteps
Int.Label: Maximum number of time steps
Int.BriefDescription: The maximum number of time steps to be taken during a single simulation (nsteps)

Double.Name: term
Double.Label: Simulation termination time
Double.BriefDescription: Define the simulation termination time, in units consistent with the problem definition (term)

Double.Name: deltat
Double.Label: Time step size
Double.BriefDescription: Define the time step size to be used. This value may be over-ridden by physics specific constraints on the time step (deltat)

Void.Name: curlfree_fix
Void.Label: Curl Free Fix (Picard only)
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the diagnostic information from the solver (solution_method::curlfree_fix)

Int.Name: itmax
Int.Label: Maximum number of iterations
Int.BriefDescription: The maximum number of non-linear iterations to be taken during each time step (solution_method::itmax)

Double.Name: eps_p0
Double.Label: Convergence criteria for initial div-free projection and initial pressure computation

Void.Name: convergence
Void.Label: Convergence
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable writing information about the non-linear convergence history to the conv file when using the Picard solution method (solution_method::convergence)

Void.Name: diagnostics
Void.Label: Diagnostics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable printing diagnostic information to the screen about the non-linear convergence history to the conv file when using the Picard solution method (solution_method::diagnostics)

Double.Name: CFLinit
Double.Label: Initial CFL number to use at startup

Double.Name: CFLmax
Double.Label: Maximum CFL number to use at startup

Double.Name: dtscale
Double.Label: Factor used to increase the time step

Double.Name: thetaa
Double.Label: Time weight for advective terms
Double.BriefDescription: Value of 0 indicates explicit advection and value of 1 indicates implicit (time_integration::thetaa)

Double.Name: thetaK
Double.Label: Time weight for advective terms
Double.BriefDescription: Value of 0 indicates explicit advection and value of 1 indicates implicit (time_integration::thetak)

Double.Name: thetaf
Double.Label: Time weight for source terms
Double.BriefDescription: Value of 0 indicates explicit treatment and value of 1 indicates implicit (time_integration::thetaf)

Int.Name: itchk
Int.Label: Convergence criteria checking frequency
Int.BriefDescription: The number of iterations to take before checking convergence criteria (transportsolver::itchk)

Void.Name: diagnostics
Void.Label: Diagnostics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the diagnostic information from the solver (transportsolver::diagnostics)

Void.Name: convergence
Void.Label: Convergence metrics
Void.BriefDescription: Enable/disable the convergence metrics or the solver (transportsolver::convergence)
